summary: Irish terrorist breaks out of prison, and heads back to Ireland intending to blow up an electronics factory
cast: Tom Bell|Susan Hampshire|Ed Begley|Noel Purcell|Jon Laurimore|Michael Standing|Philip O'Flynn|Catherine Finn|Owen Sullivan|Fred Johnson|Dermot Tuohy|Peter Madden|Dervis Ward|Ronnie Walsh|Patrick Gardiner|Robert Lepler|Don Geraghty|Desmond Perry|John Hoey|Martin Dempsey|Frank Hayden|Tom Irwin|Joe Cahill|Ronnie Masterson
title: El enemigo violento
